title: Dissertatio Physica, Refutans propositam in Academia Wittebergensi Exercitationem Physicam, Responsoria[m] Ad Introductum nuper, atque defensum In Academia Francofurtana, Dogma (prout appellatur) Placentinianum; Calorem & motum membrorum naturalem in Humano Corpore, adeoque vitam, non procedere ab anima rationali, sed a materia Coelesti subtilissima, analoga elemento Solis & stellarum fixarum, statuens
creator: Placentinus, Johannes  Boyen, Johann Reinhold
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Placentinus, Johannes  Boyen, Johann Reinhold: Dissertatio Physica, Refutans propositam in Academia Wittebergensi Exercitationem Physicam, Responsoria[m] Ad Introductum nuper, atque defensum In Academia Francofurtana, Dogma (prout appellatur) Placentinianum; Calorem & motum membrorum naturalem in Humano Corpore, adeoque vitam, non procedere ab anima rationali, sed a materia Coelesti subtilissima, analoga elemento Solis & stellarum fixarum, statuens. [Frankfurt, Oder]  Berlin 1660
